solution_line_template: There are {first_stop_on} people on the bus after the first stop.

There are {passengers_after_first_stop}+{second_stop_on}-{second_stop_off}=<<{passengers_after_first_stop}+{second_stop_on}-{second_stop_off}={passengers_after_second_stop}>>{passengers_after_second_stop} people on the bus after the second stop.

There are {passengers_after_second_stop}+{third_stop_on}-{third_stop_off}=<<{passengers_after_second_stop}+{third_stop_on}-{third_stop_off}={passengers_after_third_stop}>>{passengers_after_third_stop} people on the bus after the third stop.
